Are you tired of walking like a normal avatar? Now try something different and enojoy all Wacky Walks in one complete bundle.
This bundle includes: 1) Wacky Walk - Tumble 2) Wacky Walk - Hands 3) Wacky Walk - Glitch 4) Wacky Walk - Bear Crawl [#Legal]
